messages.title: ALASTAIR MCQUILLAN SELECTED AS GREEN PARTY CANDIDATE FOR RUTLAND AND MELTON
messages.content: ALASTAIR MCQUILLAN WILL STAND UP FOR WHAT MATTERS IN RUTLAND AND MELTON

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A reversal of NHS privatisation, which began under Labour and worsened under the Conservatives.
An education system that works for every child — and scrapping University tuition fees.
Well planned housing with local support not speculative development.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: No fracking in the vale of Belvoir
keyPolicies.policyDescription: No fracking in the vale of Belvoir.

issues.education: An education system that works for every child — and scrapping University tuition fees.
issues.environment: Well planned housing with local support not speculative development. Action on climate change.
issues.health: A reversal of NHS privatisation, which began under Labour and worsened under the Conservatives.

housing.content: Well planned housing with local support not speculative development.

quotes.text: This is an opportunity to have your say on some of the most important issues in a lifetime.

As someone born here and who lives here I rely on the the same shops, roads, schools and health services as the voters here and will stand up to protect them. We need to act for the long term, for new people and the future of the planet, not just the short term.

images.caption: Alastair McQuillan for Rutland and Melton
